query.description:
审批类型 CREDIT("授信申请", "cust_credit"),
PRODUCT("借款产品", "product"),
CREDIT_AMOUNT_OVER("授信额度终结", "credit_amt_over"),
CREDIT_AMOUNT_RECOVERY("授信额度恢复", "credit_amt_recovery"),
CREDIT_AMOUNT_STOP("授信额度止付", "credit_amt_stop"),
CUSTOMER_BASIC_INFORMATION_CHANGE("客户信息变更", "cust_basic_chg"),
BLACK_CANCEL("黑名单撤销", "cust_black_cancel"),
CREDIT_AMOUNT_CHANGE("授信额度变更", "cust_credit_amt_chg"),
CUSTOMER_OBTAIN("客户引入申请", "cust_obtain"),
RELATION_CHANGE("关联信息变更", "cust_relation_chg"),
CUSTOMER_TRANSFER("客户移交", "cust_transfer"),
GUARANTEE_CHANGE("担保人变更","guanrantee_change"),
GUARANTEE_ADD("新增担保人", "guarantee_add"),
GUARANTEE_AMOUNT_CHANGE("担保额度变更", "guarantee_amt_chg"),
LOAN_FIVE_CHANGE("五级分类变更", "loan_five_chag"),
PRODUCT_BASIC_CHANGE("授信基本产品变更", "product_basic_chg"),
PRODUCT_MARKET_BATCH_CHANGE("授信营销产品批量变更", "product_market_batch_chg"),
PRODUCT_MARKET_CHANGE("授信营销产品变更", "product_market_chg"),
PRODUCT_SUBSIDIARY_CHANGE("授信附属产品变更", "product_subsidiary_chg");
